scripts.x-reset: npm run --silent clean-version && rm -fr node_modules && rm -fr package-lock.json
scripts.x-compare-patch: cp package.json v-temp && node node_modules/xeira/src/utils-dev/diff.mjs v-temp v-patch
scripts.x-compare-minor: cp package.json v-temp && node node_modules/xeira/src/utils-dev/diff.mjs v-temp v-minor
scripts.x-compare-major: cp package.json v-temp && node node_modules/xeira/src/utils-dev/diff.mjs v-temp v-major
scripts.x-compare-number: cp package.json v-temp && node node_modules/xeira/src/utils-dev/diff.mjs v-temp v-number
scripts.x-run-patch: npm run --silent x-version-patch && npm run --silent x-compare-patch
scripts.x-run-minor: npm run --silent x-version-minor && npm run --silent x-compare-minor
scripts.x-run-major: npm run --silent x-version-major && npm run --silent x-compare-major
scripts.x-run-number: npm run --silent x-version-number && npm run --silent x-compare-number
scripts.x-run: npm run --silent clean-version && npm run --silent x-run-patch && npm run --silent x-run-minor && npm run --silent x-run-major && npm run --silent x-run-number
